name: Bay Motor Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband & I stayed here while we were at the Cape for a wedding.
reviews.title: pleasant stay

reviews.text: Cute cottages that perfectly suited our purpose.
reviews.title: Cute, basic cottage(s) with very clean bathroom

reviews.text: We would stay here again, however we would bring our own pillows as the ones provided were to soft for us.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

description: We are a family owned and operated motel. Since 1965 two generations have lived on the three acres and oversee the daily operation of the seventeen room/coddage facilty. There are Eleven standalone Cape Coddages featuring a queen or two double beds, A/C, cable TV and private tiled bath. There are two apartments featuring a gally kitchen, gas top stove, microwave, full size fridge and family/dining room and a third room as the bedroom with a queen and twin bed. Finally we have a motel unit with four separate units overlooking the pool. There are private sun facing decks. All rooms are none smoking and have small refridgerators. There is free internet. We are the only AAA rated motel/hotel in the town of Bourne.
